com.epoch.servlet

Class Ldap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.servlet.Ldap

  • public final class Ldap
extends Object
    Utility class to authenticate a username/password combination from the university directory. ACE queries the university directory only after it looks for a correct password in the ACE database. At UK, the command-line equivalent is:
    ldapsearch -z 1 -h ad.uky.edu -p 3268 -D USERNAME@ad.uky.edu -w LINKBLUEPASS foo
    or
    ldapsearch -z 1 -h mc.uky.edu -p 3268 -D USERNAME@mc.uky.edu -w LINKBLUEPASS foo

      • authenticate

        public static boolean authenticate(String username,
                                   String password)
        Authenticates the user. Modified from https://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/jndi/ldap/digest.html.
        Parameters:
        username - the user's campus login ID
        password - the user's campus password, as a string
        Returns:
        true if the user/password combination is validated

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Command-line interface.
        Parameters:
